snippet: Whole Foods Market said on Wednesday that same-store sales growth cooled in the latest quarter, even as it cut prices further and introduced its first national advertising campaign.
abstract: Whole Foods Market says same-store sales growth rose 3.6 percent in second quarter compared with year-ago quarter; first quarter growth was 4.5 percent.
lead_paragraph: Whole Foods Market said on Wednesday that same-store sales growth cooled in the latest quarter, even as it cut prices further and introduced its first national advertising campaign.

headline.main: Whole Foods Growth Slows Despite Price Cuts and Ads
headline.print_headline: Whole Foods Growth Slows Despite Price Cuts and Ads
